scripts.pre-commit: python3 -m compileall api/flask_app api/run.py && cd client && npm run pre-commit
scripts.install-dependencies: npm install && python3 -m pip install -r api/requirements.txt && cd client && npm install
scripts.start:production: echo 'Run API and client production servers in separate terminals: (1) cd api && NODE_ENV=production python3 run.py (2) cd client && npm run start:production'
